rooms.name: Entrance Hallway & Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area ensuring a welcoming and accessible entry with tactile paths for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-concept living area that flows into the dining space. Design includes low-level seating arrangements to accommodate wheelchair accessibility and subtle lighting for Vastu balance.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated area for a home theater system with soundproofing and adjustable seating options. Accessible via the living area, ensuring ease of movement.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet library zone with wall-mounted shelves and seating designed for wheelchair access. Natural light is harnessed by a strategically placed window.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with ample storage and an accessible en-suite bathroom. The room placement is aligned to Vastu principles for tranquility.

rooms.name: Wheelchair Accessible Kitchen
rooms.description: An open kitchen designed with lower countertops and maneuverable space for wheelchairs. The layout supports efficient cooking and cleaning, integrating smart storage solutions.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bathroom designed for accessibility with grab bars and non-slip surfaces.

openings.description: Accessible entrance with a ramp, wide doorways ensuring compliance with wheelchair accessibility norms.
An accessible balcony door leading to an outdoor terrace. Suitable for relaxation and small gatherings while ensuring Vastu balance by facing east.
Strategically placed windows in each room to ensure natural light and adherence to local building norms, promoting energy efficiency.
